pageContext.claim: “Senator Bob Corker just stated that, “I'm so priveledged to serve in the Senate for twelve years, and that’s what I told the people of our state that’s what I’d do, serve for two terms.” But that is Not True - wanted to run but poll numbers TANKED when I wouldn’t endorse him.”
pageContext.analysis: Todd Womack, Corker's chief of staff, previously disputed the claim the president made in his tweet. Trump called Corker and asked him to reconsider his decision not to seek reelection, according to Womack. He said the president also reaffirmed that he would have endorsed Corker had he decided to run again — which, Womack added, was not the first time that Trump had extended such an offer of support.
